<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2227457",CP="DIFFERENTIAL BRAND GROUP INC.",DN="3",CHK=613314,FOLIO='PAGE 11',FILE="DISK132:[16ZAG2.16ZAG45802]2958-2-KM-09_ZAG45802.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='FEB 24 17:46 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage36"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	39.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Effect of Default on Options.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160; Lessee shall have no right to exercise an Option: (i)&nbsp;during the period commencing with the giving of any notice of Default and continuing until said Default is cured, (ii)&nbsp;during the period of time any Rent is unpaid (without regard to whether notice thereof is given Lessee), (iii)&nbsp;during the time Lessee is in Breach of this Lease, or (iv)&nbsp;in the event that Lessee has been given 3 or more notices of separate Default, whether or not the Defaults are cured, during the 12 month period immediately preceding the exercise of the Option.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160; The period of time within which an Option may be exercised shall not be extended or enlarged by reason of Lessee&#146;s inability to exercise an Option because of the provisions of Paragraph 39.4(a).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160; An Option shall terminate and be of no further force or effect, notwithstanding Lessee&#146;s due and timely exercise of the Option, if, after such exercise and prior to the commencement of the extended term or completion of the purchase, (i)&nbsp;Lessee fails to pay Rent for a period of 30 days after such Rent becomes due (without any necessity of Lessor to give notice thereof), or (ii)&nbsp;if Lessee commits a Breach of this Lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	40.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Multiple Buildings.
</B>
	If the Premises are a part of a group of buildings controlled by Lessor, Lessee agrees that it will abide by and conform to all reasonable rules&nbsp;and regulations which Lessor may make from time to time for the management, safety, and care of said properties, including the care and cleanliness of the grounds and including the parking, loading and unloading of vehicles, and to cause its employees, suppliers, shippers, customers, contractors and invitees to so abide and conform. Lessee also agrees to pay its fair share of common expenses incurred in connection with such rules&nbsp;and regulations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	41.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Security Measures.
</B>
	Lessee hereby acknowledges that the Rent payable to Lessor hereunder does not include the cost of guard service or other security measures, and that Lessor shall have no obligation whatsoever to provide same. Lessee assumes all responsibility for the protection of the Premises, Lessee, its agents and invitees and their property from the acts of third parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	42.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Reservations.
</B>
	Lessor reserves to itself the right, from time to time, to grant, without the consent or joinder of Lessee, such easements, rights and dedications that Lessor deems necessary, and to cause the recordation of parcel maps and restrictions, so long as such easements, rights, dedications, maps and restrictions do not unreasonably interfere with the use of the Premises by Lessee. Lessee agrees to sign any documents reasonably requested by Lessor to effectuate any such easement rights, dedication, map or restrictions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	43.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Performance Under Protest.
</B>
	If
<B>
	at
</B>
	any time a dispute shall arise as to any amount or sum of money to be paid by one Party to the other under the provisions hereof, the Party against whom the obligation to pay the money is asserted shall have the right to make payment &#147;under protest&#148; and such payment shall not be regarded as a voluntary payment and there shall survive the right on the part of said Party to institute suit for recovery of such sum. If it shall be adjudged that there was no legal obligation on the part of said Party to pay such sum or any part thereof, said Party shall be entitled to recover such sum or so much thereof as it was not legally required to pay.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	44.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Authority; Multiple Parties; Execution.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(a)&#160;&#160; If either Party hereto is a corporation, trust, limited liability company, partnership, or similar entity, such party
<STRIKE>
	each individual executing this Lease on behalf of such entity
</STRIKE>
	represents and warrants that the person signing this lease on its behalf
<STRIKE>
	he or she
</STRIKE>
	is duly authorized to execute and deliver this Lease on its behalf. Each party shall, within 30 days after request, deliver to the other party satisfactory evidence of such authority.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(b)&#160;&#160; If this Lease is executed by more than one person or entity as &#147;Lessee&#148;, each such person or entity shall be jointly and severally liable hereunder. It is agreed that any one of the named Lessees shall be empowered to execute any amendment to this Lease, or other document ancillary thereto and bind all of the named Lessees, and Lessor may rely on the same as if all of the named Lessees had executed such document.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(c)&#160;&#160; This Lease may be executed by the Parties in counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original and all of which together shall constitute one and the same instrument.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	45.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Confl
</B>
	i
<B>
	ct.
</B>
	Any conflict between the printed provisions of this Lease and typewritten or handwritten provisions shall be controlled by the typewritten or handwritten provisions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	46.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Offer.
</B>
	Preparation of this Lease by either Party or their agent and submission of same to the other Party shall not be deemed an offer to lease to the other Party. This Lease is not intended to be binding until executed and delivered by all Parties hereto.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	47.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Amendments.
</B>
	This Lease may be modified only in writing, signed by the Parties in interest at the time of the modification. As long as they do not materially change Lessee&#146;s obligations hereunder, Lessee agrees to make such reasonable non-monetary modifications to this Lease as may be reasonably required by a Lender in connection with the obtaining of normal financing or refinancing of the Premises.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	48.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Waiver of Jury Trial. THE PARTIES HEREBY WAIVE THEIR RESPECTIVE RIGHTS TO TRIAL BY JURY
</B>
<B>
	IN ANY ACTION OR PROCEEDING INVOLVING THE PROPERTY OR ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	49.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Mediation and Arbitration of Disputes.
</B>
	An Addendum requiring the Mediation and/or the Arbitration of all disputes between the Parties and/or Brokers arising out of this Lease
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#168;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	is
</FONT>
<IMG WIDTH="10" HEIGHT="11" SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/02/29/0001047469-16-010580_G29582KM09I001.GIF">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;is not attached to this Lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	50.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	Americans with Disabilities Act.
</B>
	Since compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) is dependent upon Lessee&#146;s specific use of the Premises, Lessor makes no warranty or representation as to whether or not the Premises comply with ADA or any similar legislation. In the event that Lessee&#146;s use of the Premises requires modifications or additions to the Premises in order to be in ADA compliance, Lessee agrees to make any such necessary modifications and/or additions at Lessee&#146;s expense.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	LESSOR AND LESSEE HAVE CAREFULLY READ AND REVIEWED THIS LEASE AND EACH TERM AND PROVISION CONTAINED HEREIN, AND BY THE EXECUTION OF THIS LEASE SHOW THEIR INFORMED AND VOLUNTARY CONSENT THERETO. THE PARTIES HEREBY AGREE THAT, AT THE TIME THIS LEASE IS EXECUTED, THE TERMS OF THIS LEASE ARE COMMERCIALLY REASONABLE AND EFFECTUATE THE INTENT AND PURPOSE OF LESSOR AND LESSEE WITH RESPECT TO THE PREMISES.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ATTENTION:
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NO REPRESENTATION OR RECOMMENDATION IS MADE BY THE AIR COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE ASSOCIATION OR BY ANY BROKER AS TO THE LEGAL SUFFICIENCY, LEGAL EFFECT, OR TAX CONSEQUENCES OF THIS LEASE OR THE TRANSACTION TO WHICH IT RELATES. THE PARTIES ARE URGED TO:
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;
<B>
	SEEK ADVICE OF COUNSEL AS TO THE LEGAL AND TAX CONSEQUENCES OF THIS LEASE.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;
<B>
	RETAIN APPROPRIATE CONSULTANTS TO REVIEW AND INVESTIGATE THE CONDITION OF THE PREMISES. SAID INVESTIGATION SHOULD INCLUDE BUT NOT BE LIMITED TO: THE POSSIBLE PRESENCE OF HAZARDOUS SUBSTANCES, THE ZONING OF THE PREMISES, THE STRUCTURAL INTEGRITY, THE CONDITION OF THE ROOF AND OPERATING SYSTEMS, AND THE SUITABILITY OF THE PREMISES FOR LESSEE&#146;S INTENDED USE.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WARNING:
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	IF THE PREMISES IS LOCATED IN A STATE OTHER THAN CALIFORNIA, CERTAIN PROVISIONS OF THE LEASE MAY&nbsp;NEED TO BE REVISED TO COMPLY WITH THE LAWS OF THE STATE IN WHICH THE PREMISES IS LOCATED.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	The parties hereto have executed this Lease at the place and on the dates specified above their respective signatures.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Paragraph
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;51&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	A.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RENT ADJUSTMENTS:
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	The monthly rent for each month of the adjustment period(s)&nbsp;specified below shall be increased using the method(s)&nbsp;indicated below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(Check Method(s) to be Used and Fill in Appropriately) .
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	I.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cost of Living Adjustment(s)&nbsp;(COLA)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="32%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:32.5%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	On (Fill in COLA Dates):
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="67%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:67.5%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="32%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:32.5%;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:150%;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="67%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:67.5%;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:150%;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:150%;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	the Base Rent shall be adjusted by the change, if any, from the Base Month specified below, in the Consumer Price Index of the Bureau of Labor Statistics of the U.S. Department of Labor for (select one):
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	&#168;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	CPI W (Urban Wage Earners and Clerical Workers) or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	CPI U (All Urban Consumers), for (Fill in Urban Area):
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="92%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:92.92%;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:150%;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:7.08%;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:150%;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="92%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:92.92%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:2.0PT 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 1PT 0IN;WIDTH:7.08%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:2.0PT 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	, All Items
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(1982-1984 = 100), herein referred to as &#147;CPI&#148;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	The monthly rent payable in accordance with paragraph A.l.a. of this Addendum shall be calculated as follows: the Base Rent set forth in paragraph 1.5 of the attached Lease, shall be multiplied by a fraction the numerator of which shall be the CPI of the calendar month 2 months prior to the month(s)&nbsp;specified in paragraph A.l.a. above during which the adjustment is to take effect, and the denominator of which shall be the CPI of the calendar month which is 2 months prior to (select one): the
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	first month of the term of this Lease as set forth in paragraph 1.3 (&#147;Base Month&#148;) or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(Fill in Other &#147;Base Month&#148;): _______________________________________________________________________________.&#160; The sum so calculated shall constitute the new monthly rent hereunder, but in no event, shall any such new monthly rent be less than the rent payable for the month immediately preceding the rent adjustment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	In the event the compilation and/or publication of the CPI shall be transferred to any other governmental department or bureau or agency or shall be discontinued, then the index most nearly the same as the CPI shall be used to make such calculation. In the event that the Parties cannot agree on such alternative index, then the matter shall be submitted for decision to the American Arbitration Association in accordance with the then rules&nbsp;of said Association and the decision of the arbitrators shall be binding upon the parties. The cost of said Arbitration shall be paid equally by the Parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	II.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Market Rental Value Adjustment(s)&nbsp;(MRV)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="40%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:40.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	On (Fill in MRV Adjustment Date(s):
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="60%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:60.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="40%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:40.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3.0PT 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="60%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:60.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3.0PT 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:2.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	the Base Rent shall be adjusted to the &#147;Market Rental Value&#148; of the property as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:5.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.85IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	1)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Four months prior to each Market Rental Value Adjustment Date described above, the Parties shall attempt to agree upon what the new MRV will be on the adjustment date. If agreement cannot be reached within thirty days, then:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Lessor and Lessee shall immediately appoint a mutually acceptable appraiser or broker to establish the new MRV within the next 30 days. Any associated costs will be split equally between the Parties, or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Both Lessor and Lessee shall each immediately make a reasonable determination of the MRV and submit such determination, in writing, to arbitration in accordance with the following provisions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.75IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(i)&nbsp;Within 15 days thereafter, Lessor and Lessee shall each select an
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	appraiser or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	broker (
<B>
	&#147;Consultant&#148;
</B>
	- check one) of their choice to act as an arbitrator. The two arbitrators so appointed shall immediately select a third mutually acceptable Consultant to act as a third arbitrator.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.75IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(ii)&nbsp;The 3 arbitrators shall within 30 days of the appointment of the third arbitrator reach a decision as to what the actual MRV for the Premises is, and whether Lessor&#146;s or Lessee&#146;s submitted MRV is the closest thereto. The decision of a majority of the arbitrators shall be binding on the Parties. The submitted MRV which is determined to be the closest to the actual MRV shall thereafter be used by the Parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="84%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0.375PT 0IN;WIDTH:84.0%;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PAGE
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	OF 2
<A NAME="A2227457ZEX-10_45_HTM_2958-2-KM-11_PB_1_200053_8434">
</A>
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GB
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="84%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:84.0%;">

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">

</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">

<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	INITIALS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="84%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:84.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	INITIALS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:50.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:7.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="50%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:50.0%;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 10.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:7.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="50%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:50.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 10.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#169;2000 - AIR COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE ASSOCIATION
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="50%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:50.0%;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 10.0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;TEXT-INDENT:-10.0PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	FORM&nbsp;RA-3-8/00E
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=15,EFW="2227457",CP="DIFFERENTIAL BRAND GROUP INC.",DN="3",CHK=777305,FOLIO='PAGE 1',FILE="DISK132:[16ZAG2.16ZAG45802]2958-2-KM-11_ZAG45802.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='FEB 24 18:54 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage38"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.75IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(iii)&nbsp;If either of the Parties fails to appoint an arbitrator within the specified 15 days, the arbitrator timely appointed by one of them shall reach a decision on his or her own, and said decision shall be binding on the Parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.75IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.75IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(iv)&nbsp;The entire cost of such arbitration shall be paid by the party whose submitted MRV is not selected, ie. the one that is NOT the closest to the actual MRV.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.85IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	2)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, the new MRV shall not be less than the rent payable for the month immediately preceding the rent adjustment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .75IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Upon the establishment of each New Market Rental Value:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.85IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	1) the new MRV will become the new &#147;Base Rent&#148; for the purpose of calculating any further Adjustments, and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.85IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	2) the first month of each Market Rental Value term shall become the new &#145;Base Month&#146; for the purpose of calculating any further Adjustments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<IMG WIDTH="10" HEIGHT="11" SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/02/29/0001047469-16-010580_G29582KM11I002.GIF">
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	III.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fixed Rental Adjustment(s)&nbsp;(FRA)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	The Base Rent shall be increased to the following amounts on the dates set forth below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:4.0PT;">

	Unless specified otherwise herein, notice of any such adjustments, other than Fixed Rental Adjustments, shall be made as specified in paragraph 23 of the Lease.

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	The Brokers shall be paid a Brokerage Fee for each adjustment specified above in accordance with paragraph 15 of the Lease.
</FONT>

	NOTE: These forms are often modified to meet changing requirements of law and needs of the industry. Always write or call to make sure you are utilizing the most current form: AIR COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE ASSOCIATION, 700 S. Flower Street, Suite&nbsp;600, Los Angeles, California 90017.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:4.0PT 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">

	&nbsp;

	Address of Premises:

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Paragraph
<U>
	52&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	A.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	OPTION(S)&nbsp;TO EXTEND:
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	Lessor hereby grants to Lessee the option to extend the term of this Lease for
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;one (1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	additional
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;thirty-six&nbsp;(36
</U>
	month period(s) commencing when the prior term expires upon each and all of the following terms and conditions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In order to exercise an option to extend, Lessee must give written notice of such election to Lessor and Lessor must receive the same at least
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	but not more than
<U>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9&nbsp;&nbsp;
</U>
	months prior to the date that the option period would commence, time being of the essence. If proper notification of the exercise of an option is not given and/or received, such option shall automatically expire. Options (if there are more than one) may only be exercised consecutively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The provisions of paragraph 39, including those relating to Lessee&#146;s Default set forth in paragraph 39.4 of this Lease, are conditions of this Option.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except for the provisions of this Lease granting an option or options to extend the term, all of the terms and conditions of this Lease except where specifically modified by this option shall apply.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Option is personal to the original Lessee, and cannot be assigned or exercised by anyone other than said original Lessee and only while the original Lessee is in full possession of the Premises and without the intention of thereafter assigning or subletting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The monthly rent for each month of the option period shall be calculated as follows, using the method(s)&nbsp;indicated below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(Check Method(s)&nbsp;to be Used and Fill in Appropriately)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	I.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Cost of Living Adjustment(s)&nbsp;(COLA)
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="26%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:26.66%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	a.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On (Fill in COLA Dates):&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="73%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:73.34%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="26%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:26.66%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="73%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:73.34%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	the Base Rent shall be adjusted by the change, if any, from the Base Month specified below, in the Consumer Price Index of the Bureau of Labor Statistics of the U.S. Department of Labor for (select one):
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#168;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	CPI W (Urban Wage Earners and Clerical Workers) or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#168;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	CPI U (All Urban Consumers), for (Fill in Urban Area):
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="1" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="24%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:24.16%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="75%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:75.84%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	All Items (1982-1984 = 100), herein referred to as &#147;CPI&#148;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	b.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The monthly rent payable in accordance with paragraph A.l.a. of this Addendum shall be calculated as follows: the Base Rent set forth in paragraph 1.5 of the attached Lease, shall be multiplied by a fraction the numerator of which shall be the CPI of the calendar month 2 months prior to the month(s)&nbsp;specified in paragraph A.I.a. above during which the adjustment is to take effect, and the denominator of which shall be the CPI of the calendar month which is 2 months prior to (select one):
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	the first month of the term of this Lease as set forth in paragraph 1.3 (&#147;Base Month&#148;) or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(Fill in Other &#147;Base Month&#148;):
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="1" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="24%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:24.16%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="75%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:75.84%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	The sum so calculated shall constitute the new monthly rent hereunder, but in no event, shall any such new monthly rent be less than the rent payable for the month immediately preceding the rent adjustment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	c.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the compilation and/or publication of the CPI shall be transferred to any other governmental department or bureau or agency or shall be discontinued, then the index most nearly the same as the CPI shall be used to make such calculation. In the event that the Parties cannot agree on such alternative index, then the matter shall be submitted for decision to the American Arbitration Association in accordance with the then rules&nbsp;of said Association and the decision of the arbitrators shall be binding upon the parties. The cost of said Arbitration shall be paid equally by the Parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&#254;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	II.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Market Rental Value Adjustment(s)&nbsp;(MRV)
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="35%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:35.84%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	a.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On (Fill in MRV Adjustment Date(s))&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="64%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:64.16%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	June&nbsp;1, 2015
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="35%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:35.84%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="64%" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:64.16%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	the Base Rent shall be adjusted to the &#147;Market Rental Value&#148; of the property as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	1)&nbsp;&nbsp;Four months prior to each Market Rental Value Adjustment Date described above, the Parties shall attempt to agree upon what the new MRV will be on the adjustment date. If agreement cannot be reached, within thirty days, then:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.75IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessor and Lessee shall immediately appoint a mutually acceptable appraiser or broker to establish the new MRV within the next 30 days. Any associated costs will be split equally between the Parties, or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.75IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Both Lessor and Lessee shall each immediately make a reasonable determination of the MRV and submit such determination, in
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:1.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="84%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0.375PT 0IN;WIDTH:84.0%;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PAGE
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	OF 2
<A NAME="A2227457ZEX-10_45_HTM_2958-2-KM-13_PB_1_201707_5335">
</A>
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="8%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:8.0%;">

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=17,EFW="2227457",CP="DIFFERENTIAL BRAND GROUP INC.",DN="3",CHK=533298,FOLIO='PAGE 1',FILE="DISK132:[16ZAG2.16ZAG45802]2958-2-KM-13_ZAG45802.CHC",USER="CBRANDT",CD='FEB 24 19:14 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage39"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	writing, to arbitration in accordance with the following provisions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Within 15 days thereafter, Lessor and Lessee shall each select an
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	appraiser or
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	x
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	broker (
<B>
	&#147;Consultant&#148;
</B>
	- check one) of their choice to act as an arbitrator. The two arbitrators so appointed shall immediately select a third mutually acceptable Consultant to act as a third arbitrator.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The 3 arbitrators shall within 30 days of the appointment of the third arbitrator reach a decision as to what the actual MRV for the Premises is, and whether Lessor&#146;s or Lessee&#146;s submitted MRV is the closest thereto. The decision of a majority of the arbitrators shall be binding on the Parties. The submitted MRV which is determined to be the closest to the actual MRV shall thereafter be used by the Parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If either of the Parties fails to appoint an arbitrator within the specified 15 days, the arbitrator timely appointed by one of them shall reach a decision on his or her own, and said decision shall be binding on the Parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The entire cost of such arbitration shall be paid by the party whose submitted MRV is not selected, ie. the one that is NOT the closest to the actual MRV.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the new MRV shall not be less than the rent payable for the month immediately preceding the rent adjustment and the new &#147;MRV&#148; shall not be greater than $13,810. Thereafter, the new MRV shall be increased by 3% per annum during the Option term, on each anniversary date of the commencement of the Option term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .25IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	b.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the establishment of each New Market Rental Value:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the new MRV will become the new &#147;Base Rent&#148; for the purpose of calculating any further Adjustments, and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the first month of each Market Rental Value term shall become the new &#147;Base Month&#148; for the purpose of calculating any further Adjustments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="WINGDINGS" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	III.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<B>
	Fixed Rental Adjustment(s)&nbsp;(FRA)
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	The Base Rent shall be increased to the following amounts on the dates set forth below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="ARIAL" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Paragraph 52: &#150;
</FONT>
</B>
	See Attached Option to Extend Rider.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Paragraph 53: &#150; Rental Abatement:
</FONT>
</B>
	Lessee shall not be responsible for payment of rent for the first month (May&nbsp;1, 2012 to May&nbsp;31, 2012) of the initial lease term.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Paragraph 54: - Tenant Improvements:
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Lessor shall at its cost make the following Tenant Improvements:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Reconfigure the existing office area per plans prepared for Lessee by Matt Simon and approved by Lessor. Such plans are attached hereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Paint walls and ceilings in the offices and restrooms.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Repair and/or replace burned out or damaged light fixtures.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Replace and/or repair any damaged ceiling foil.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Install new HVAC equipment with the exception of one unit that is roughly two years old.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Ensure Title 19, five year certification for fire sprinklers is current.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Patch and slurry coat and re-stripe parking lot surface by August&nbsp;31, 2012. Such work shall be done over the weekend or otherwise in a manner to minimize disruption of parking.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Install roughly 3,500 SF of industrial grade carpet similar to the existing carpet at a cost not to exceed $5,000. Any amount over $5,000 will be paid for by Lessee.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:-.25IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Repair/fill holes in the exterior walls of the building.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:SIMPLE;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Paragraph 55: HVAC:
</FONT>
</B>
	Lessor will be responsible for HVAC maintenance contract during first year of lease term. The Lessee shall be responsible to maintain a service contract for the HVAC system for years two and three of the initial lease term and any extensions.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="5" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:16.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECOND AMENDMENT
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	This is the SECOND AMENDEMENT to the lease agreement, dated, March&nbsp;12, 2012 by and between
<U>
	The East Los Angeles Community Union, a California Corporation
</U>
	(&#147;Lessor&#148;) and
<U>
	Hudson Clothing, LLC (&#147;Lessee&#148;).
</U>
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	In reference to page&nbsp;1 of 13, paragraph 1.3 of the lease agreement, the ending date is hereby extended to
<U>
	August&nbsp;31, 2017.
</U>
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	In reference to page&nbsp;1 of 13, paragraph 1.5 of the Lease Agreement, the Base Rent for the period commencing September&nbsp;1, 2015 and ending August&nbsp;31, 2017 shall be changed to $12,554.67.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	In reference to paragraph 52A,&nbsp;II, (a)&nbsp;of &#147;Option(s)&nbsp;to Extend,&#148; the Market Rental Value adjustment date shall be changed to September&nbsp;1, 2017.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>

</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="3" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</B>

<TD WIDTH="47%" COLSPAN="2" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:47.5%;">

	Address: 1231 Gerhart, Commerce, CA

	90022
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:5.0%;">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">

	&nbsp;

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	January&nbsp;28, 2016
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Robert Graham Designs, LLC
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	264 W 40th Street
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	New York, New York 10018
